name: Kunal Pratap Singh
intro: Focused on building products that will make people's lives better. I also create content in form of blogs and threads. I love to learn new things and I am always open to learn new technologies.
about: A passionate individual who always thrives to work on end to end products which develop sustainable and scalable social and technical systems to create impact.

projects.name: Beauty bebo clone
projects.about: We cloned this website in a span of seven days. The Tech stack used is Html CSS javascript.Various UI like slideshow,login-signup, payment etc are eye-catching.javascript functionality like API, local storage, slide show with the help of set interval etc is used.

projects.name: Licious Clone
projects.about: This is our first project at Masai School using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.We worked on the Licious website, an online Non-Vegetarian Food selling store.

projects.name: Authentication & Api Call
projects.about: This Project consist signup snd login with the help of mongoDB database, without login you will not be able to see any pages . For the UI ,Chakra-UI is used.

projects.name: Lifestylestores clone
projects.about: A lifestyle store is a retail store selling a wide variety of product categories under a single brand. It is designed to associate a brand with one or another aspirational lifestyle. Lifestyle stores may include clothing, housewares, furniture, stationery, gifts, and so on.

work: Set up CRM integration for easy Excel uploads, helping QA teams in BPO audits. Also, created a strong Excel filtering system to better manage and analyze data. Features include saving filters and random assignment, covering various criteria like call duration and time range.
Designed a notice feed allowing admins and QAs to post, with acknowledgment and commenting features for agents, admins, and QAs; creators can also delete and hide posts.

Developed a dynamic audit sheet with editable parameters and subparameters, including weightage assignment. Integrated custom field functionality in audit sheet using form renderer to capture data effectively
Designed a test interface accessible to both agents and admins. Agents can complete tests, while admins have the capability to create new tests directly within the interface.
Developed an AI co-pilot to aid QA in call auditing. Leveraging Deepgram for transcription and Langchain for OpenAI calls, it assists in analyzing and evaluating call content efficiently.
experience.name: Omind

work: Developed actyv.aiâ€™s e-KYC verification platform with microservice architecture on the MERN stack, en-abling fully automatic identity verification and fraud detection.
Achieved results, reducing distributor onboarding time from 1 week to 2 hours and efficiently processing 12k+ verifications across 2 countries.
Responsible for operational excellence of platform which involved prevention and mitigation of issues eg. memory leak, VAPT, code review and quality assurance, user support and communication etc.

Developed multiple distributed background plugins, utilizing SQS and lambda, to enable smooth verification processes for Aadhaar, ITR, Driving license, Voter ID, CIN, PAN, Udyam, Passport OCR (valid for all countries), ESign, DigiLocker, and Emirates ID (UAE).
Developed and implemented responsive UI for all fraud checks using React and Redux, ensuring a seamless user experience across various devices.
experience.name: Actyv.ai

work: Led the setup and maintenance of Cartificer's online store, making it easy for customers to find car services like cleaning and repairs. This made customers happier and more engaged.
Created a way for customers to give feedback in real-time on Cartificer's website. This helped improve services, including car repairs, and kept customers coming back.
Made sure paying for services on Cartificer's website was safe and easy, including for car repairs. This made customers trust the site more and helped the business grow.

Enabled customers to book appointments, check services, and access special offers effortlessly through Cartificer's mobile-friendly platform, expanding accessibility and improving service quality, including for car repairs.
experience.name: Cartificer
